body: I bought emerald 5 mins ago and it hasnt come through...... someone out of staff please help
body_tagged: I bought emerald 5 mins ago and it hasnt come through...... someone out of staff please help
title: my rank hasnt come through

replies.body:
next time wait on your other thread untill someone replied: 
It can take a while until you get your rank. This can take up to 24h. if you don't get your rank in this time, send an email with your purchase reciept to the support and they'll see what they can do.
replies.body_tagged:
next time wait on your other thread untill someone replied:

replies.body:
It seems that your rank has come through. Congratulations o buying emerald, however, I will lock this thread to prevent further spam.

Once again, congrats! ;p
